titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 8873) to amend title 3, United States Code, to reform the process for the counting of electoral votes, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 8873) to amend title 3, United States Code, to reform the process for the counting of electoral votes, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-481, by Mr. Raskin.
Resolution also provides one motion to recommit.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 103.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1372.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 209 (Roll no. 445).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 209 (Roll no. 446).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 8873) to amend title 3, United States Code, to reform the process for the counting of electoral votes.
